allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: panel chat app with AI survey debate engine

FastAPI + LangGraph backend with DuckDB for survey data, concurrent
agent debate via Send API fan-out, and WebSocket streaming. React +
Vite + TypeScript frontend with Tailwind, shadcn/ui, and Zustand.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Settings overhaul: client-side API keys, model selector with Gemini, settings modal

- Replace server-side API keys with client-provided keys \(BYOK\)
- Add Gemini support via langchain-google-genai
- Replace LLM provider dropdown with model selector \(6 models across 3 providers\)
- Move settings from sidebar into a modal with API key input, model picker,
  panel size slider \(2-1136 with cost warning\), and rounds slider
- Persist API key and model to localStorage; auto-open modal on first visit
- WS protocol sends API key as first message after connect
- Add cursor rules and comprehensive README

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update model options to latest: Claude Opus 4.6, GPT-5.2, o3, Gemini 2.5

Replace dated models \(Claude Sonnet 4, GPT-4o, Gemini 2.0 Flash\) with
current options: Claude Opus 4.6, Claude Sonnet 4.5, GPT-5.2, GPT-4.1,
o3, o3 Mini, Gemini 2.5 Pro, Gemini 2.5 Flash.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
